job.name: Animal/Monster Handler
job.description: Responsible For The Safe Keeping, Dietary Care, And Exercise Of Animals Or Monsters.

job.name: Arborist
job.description: Maintains And Cares For Trees, Often By Surgically Removing Dying Limbs.

job.name: Baler
job.description: Bales Hay, Or In The Mills, Wool And Cotton Goods.

job.name: Beekeeper
job.description: Owns And Breeds Bees, Especially For Their Honey.

job.name: Breeder
job.description: Breeds Livestock, Animals, Or Monsters.

job.name: Cowherd
job.description: Supervises Grazing Cattle.

job.name: Dairyboy/Dairymaid
job.description: Milks Cows And Makes Cheese And Butter.

job.name: Falconer
job.description: Keeps, Trains, And Hunts With Falcons, Hawks, Or Other Birds Of Prey.

job.name: Farmer
job.description: Operates A Farm Or Cultivates Land.

job.name: Fisher
job.description: Catches Fish.

job.name: Florist
job.description: Grows And Arranges Plants And Cut Flowers.

job.name: Forager
job.description: Searches For Food In The Wild.

job.name: Forester
job.description: Supervises The Wellbeing Of A Forest.

job.name: Fowler
job.description: Catches Or Ensnares Birds.

job.name: Gamekeeper
job.description: Breeds And Protects Game, Typically For A Large Estate.

job.name: Groom
job.description: Cleans And Brushes The Coats Horses, Dogs, Or Other Animals.

job.name: Herder
job.description: Supervises A Herd Of Livestock Or Makes A Living From Keeping Livestock, Especially In Open Country.

job.name: Horse Trainer
job.description: Tends To Horses And Teaches Them Different Disciplines.

job.name: Hunter
job.description: Hunts Game Or Other Wild Animals.

job.name: Lumberjack
job.description: Fells Trees, Cuts Them Into Logs, And Transports Them To A Sawmill.

job.name: Master-of-Horses
job.description: Supervises And Commands All Horses Under A Jurisdiction.

job.name: Master-of-Hounds
job.description: Maintains A Pack Of Hounds And Their Associated Staff, Equipment, And Hunting Arrangements.

job.name: Miller
job.description: Owns Or Works In A Grain Mill.

job.name: Miner
job.description: Works Underground In Mines In Order To Obtain Minerals Such As Coal, Diamonds, Or Gold.

job.name: Pathfinder
job.description: Scouts Ahead And Discovers A Path Or Way For Others.

job.name: Plumer
job.description: Hunts Birds For Their Plumes.

job.name: Prospector
job.description: Searches For Mineral Deposits, Especially By Drilling And Excavation.

job.name: Renderer
job.description: Converts Waste Animal Tissue Into Usable Materials.

job.name: Shepherd
job.description: Herds, Tends, And Guards Sheep.

job.name: Stablehand
job.description: Works In A Stable.

job.name: Thresher
job.description: Separates Grain From The Plants By Beating.

job.name: Trapper
job.description: Traps Wild Animals, Especially For Their Fur.

job.name: Vintner
job.description: Engages In Winemaking, Especially With Monitoring And Harvesting The Grapes.

job.name: Zookeeper
job.description: Maintains And Cares For Animals Or Monsters In A Zoo.

job.name: Architect
job.description: Designs Buildings Or Landscapes And In Many Cases Supervises Their Construction.

job.name: Brickmaker
job.description: Crafts Bricks From Clay, Stone, Or Other Materials.

job.name: Brickmason
job.description: Builds With Mineral Products Such As Stones, Bricks, Cinder Blocks, Or Tiles, Usually With The Use Of Mortar As A Bonding Agent.

job.name: Carpenter
job.description: Makes And Repairs Wooden Objects And Structures.

job.name: Construction Worker
job.description: A Laborer In The Physical Construction Of A Built Environment And Its Infrastructure.

job.name: General Contractor
job.description: Supervises A Construction Site, Manages Its Vendors And Trades, And Communicates Information To All Involved Parties.

job.name: Glazier
job.description: Fits Glass Into Windows And Doors.

job.name: Plasterer
job.description: Applies Plaster To Walls, Ceilings, Or Other Surfaces.

job.name: Roadlayer/Streetlayer
job.description: Paves Roads Or Streets.

job.name: Roofer/Thatcher
job.description: Builds And Repairs Roofs.

job.name: Stonemason
job.description: Cuts And Prepares Stone For Use In Construction.

job.name: Acrobat
job.description: Performs Spectacular Gymnastic Feats.

job.name: Actor
job.description: Impersonates Characters, Typically On Stage In A Theatrical Production.

job.name: Aerialist/Trapezist
job.description: Performs Acrobatics High Above The Ground On A Tightrope Or Trapeze.

job.name: Arranger
job.description: Adapts A Musical Composition For Performance.

job.name: Athlete
job.description: Proficient In Sports And Other Forms Of Physical Exercise.

job.name: Busker/Street Musician
job.description: Performs In A Public Place, Often For Money.

job.name: Celebrity
job.description: A Famous Person.

job.name: Chef
job.description: A Professional Cook Trained In The Culinary Arts.

job.name: Choirmaster
job.description: Trains A Choir And Orchestrates Their Singing When They Perform.

job.name: Clown
job.description: Comic Entertainer Who Wears A Traditional Costume And Exaggerated Makeup.

job.name: Comedian
job.description: Entertainer Whose Act Is Designed To Make An Audience Laugh.

job.name: Conductor
job.description: Directs The Performance Of An Orchestra.

job.name: Contortionist
job.description: Twists And Bends Their Body Into Strange And Unnatural Positions.

job.name: Curator
job.description: Keeper And Custodian Of A Museum Or Other Collections Of Precious Items.

job.name: Costumer
job.description: Makes Theatrical Costumes.

job.name: Dancer
job.description: Moves Their Body Rhythmically With Or Without Musical Accompaniment.

job.name: Equilibrist
job.description: Performs Balancing Feats.

job.name: Fashion Designer
job.description: Applies Design, Aesthetics And Natural Beauty To Garments And Their Accessories.

job.name: Gladiator
job.description: Fights Against Other People, Wild Animals, Or Monsters In An Arena.

job.name: Glasspainter
job.description: Produces Colorful Designs On Or In Glass.

job.name: Jester
job.description: Professional Joker Or “Fool” At Court, Typically Wearing A Cap With Bells On It And Carrying A Mock Scepter.

job.name: Juggler
job.description: Keeps Several Objects In Motion In The Air At The Same Time By Alternately Tossing And Catching Them.

job.name: Illuminator
job.description: Paints And Calligraphs To Adorn Or Enlighten Scrolls And Manuscripts.

job.name: Limner
job.description: Paints Portraits Or Miniatures.

job.name: Makeup Artist
job.description: Applies Cosmetics To Models, Actors, Nobles, Etc.

job.name: Minstrel
job.description: Recites Lyric Or Heroic Poetry For Nobility.

job.name: Model
job.description: Poses As A Subject For An Artist, Fashion Designer, Or Sculptor.

job.name: Musician
job.description: Plays A Musical Instrument.

job.name: Painter
job.description: Paints Pictures.

job.name: Playwright
job.description: Writes Plays Or Musicals.

job.name: Poet
job.description: Writes Ballads, Epics, Sonnets, Or Other Forms Of Poetry.

job.name: Ringmaster/Ringmistress
job.description: Master Of Ceremony Who Introduces The Circus Acts To The Audience.

job.name: Ropewalker
job.description: Walks Along A Tightrope To Entertain Others.

job.name: Sculptor
job.description: Crafts Art By Carving Or Casting Blocks Of Marble, Stones, Or Other Hardened Minerals.

job.name: Singer/Soprano
job.description: Sings With Or Without Instrumental Accompaniment.

job.name: Skald
job.description: Composes And Recites Poems Honoring Heroes And Their Deeds.

job.name: Stage Magician
job.description: Deceives Their Audience With Seemingly Impossible Feats While Using Only Natural Means.

job.name: Stuntman/Stuntwoman
job.description: Performs Dangerous Stunts For Their Audience.

job.name: Tattooist
job.description: Illustrates The Skin With Indelible Patterns, Pictures, Legends, Etc.

job.name: Theater Director
job.description: Supervises And Orchestrates The Mounting Of A Theatre Production By Unifying Various Endeavors And Aspects Of Production.

job.name: Wrestler
job.description: Performs In Matches Involving Grappling And Grappling-Type Techniques.

job.name: Writer
job.description: Commits His Or Her Thoughts, Ideas, Etc., Into Written Language.

job.name: Accountant
job.description: Keeps And Inspects Financial Accounts.

job.name: Actuary
job.description: Compiles And Analyzes Statistics And Uses Them To Calculate Risk.

job.name: Animal Collector/Monster Collector
job.description: Collects And Deals In Rare And Exotic Animals And Monsters.

job.name: Business Owner
job.description: Owns A Business Entity In An Attempt To Profit From Its Successful Operations.

job.name: Debt Collector
job.description: Recovers Money Owed On Delinquent Accounts.

job.name: Draper
job.description: An Alcohol Merchant.

job.name: Appraiser
job.description: Assesses The Monetary Value Of Something.

job.name: Auctioneer
job.description: Conducts Auctions By Accepting Bids And Declaring Goods Sold.

job.name: Banker
job.description: An Officer Or Owner Of A Bank Or Group Of Banks.

job.name: Bagniokeeper
job.description: Owner Of A Bath House Or Brothel.

job.name: Bookkeeper
job.description: Keeps Records Of Financial Affairs.

job.name: Chandler
job.description: Deals In Provisions And Supplies.

job.name: Collector
job.description: Collects Things Of A Specified Type, Professionally Or As A Hobby.

job.name: Entrepreneur
job.description: Organizes And Operates A Business Or Businesses, Taking On Greater Than Normal Financial Risks In Order To Do So.

job.name: Grocer
job.description: A Food Merchant.

job.name: Guild Master
job.description: Leads An Economically Independent Producer (A “Guild,” An Association Of Craftsmen Or Merchants That Often Holds Considerable Bureaucratic Power).

job.name: Innkeeper
job.description: Owns And Runs An Inn.

job.name: Land Surveyor
job.description: Establishes Maps And Boundaries For Ownership Or Other Purposes Required By Government Or Civil Law.

job.name: Merchant
job.description: Sells And Trades Goods.

job.name: Moneychanger
job.description: Exchanges One Currency For Another.

job.name: Moneylender
job.description: Lends Money To Others Who Pay Interest.

job.name: Peddler
job.description: Travels From Place To Place Selling Assorted Items.

job.name: Pimp/Madame
job.description: Controls Prostitutes And Arranges Clients For Them, Taking Part Of Their Earnings In Return.

job.name: Plantation Owner
job.description: An Owner Of An Estate On Which Crops Are Cultivated By Resident Labor, Typically Slave Labor.

job.name: Speculator
job.description: Invests In Stocks, Property, Or Other Ventures In The Hope Of Making A Profit.

job.name: Thriftdealer
job.description: Deals In Secondhand Items.

job.name: Tradesman
job.description: Deals Exclusively In Bartering.

job.name: Vendor
job.description: Deals Items In The Street.

job.name: Billboardposter
job.description: A Person Who Puts Up Notices, Signs And Advertisements.

job.name: Courier
job.description: Transports Packages And Documents.

job.name: Herald
job.description: A Messenger Who Carries Important News.

job.name: Interpreter
job.description: Interprets Language And Its Meaning, Especially Within Ancient Manuscripts.

job.name: Linguist
job.description: Studies The Essence Of Communication, Including The Units, Nature, Structure, And Modification Of Language.

job.name: Messenger
job.description: Carries Messages Between Recipients.

job.name: Town Crier
job.description: Makes Public Announcements In The Streets Or Marketplace.

job.name: Translator
job.description: Translates Between Languages.

job.name: Accoutrementer/Coinsmith
job.description: Makes Currency For The Government.

job.name: Armorer
job.description: Specializes In Making And Repairing Armor.

job.name: Blacksmith
job.description: Forges And Repairs Things In Metal, Including Weapons, Armor, Utensils, Etc.

job.name: Bladesmith
job.description: Specializes In Making And Repairing Bladed Weapons, Especially Swords And Daggers.

job.name: Bookbinder
job.description: Binds Books And Wraps Scrolls.

job.name: Bottler
job.description: Bottles Drinks And Other Liquids.

job.name: Bowyer
job.description: Makes Bows And Crossbows.

job.name: Brewer
job.description: Brews Ale.

job.name: Broom Maker
job.description: Makes Brooms And Brushes.

job.name: Candlemaker
job.description: Makes Candles And Wax From Honey And Tallow.

job.name: Cartwright
job.description: Makes And Repairs Carts And Wagons.

job.name: Cobbler
job.description: Makes And Repairs Footwear.

job.name: Cooper/Hooper
job.description: Makes And Repairs Casks And Barrels.

job.name: Cutler
job.description: Makes Cutlery.

job.name: Dyer
job.description: Dyes Cloth And Other Materials.

job.name: Embroiderer
job.description: Ornaments With Needlework.

job.name: Engraver
job.description: Incises A Design Onto A Hard Surface By Cutting Grooves Into It.

job.name: Farrier
job.description: Trims And Shoes Horses’ Hooves.

job.name: Fletcher
job.description: Makes And Repairs Arrows.

job.name: Furniture Artisan
job.description: Makes And Repairs Furniture.

job.name: Furrier
job.description: Prepares Furs For Adornment.

job.name: Glassworker
job.description: Blows Glass Planes And Items.

job.name: Glovemaker
job.description: Makes And Repairs Gloves.

job.name: Goldsmith/Silversmith
job.description: A Smith Who Specializes In Precious Metals.

job.name: Hatter/Milliner
job.description: Makes And Repairs Headwear.

job.name: Instrument Maker
job.description: Makes And Repairs Musical Instruments.

job.name: Lapidary
job.description: Turns Stone, Minerals, Or Gemstones Into Decorative Items Such As Cabochons, Engraved Gems, And Faceted Designs.

job.name: Leatherworker
job.description: Makes Items From Leather Such As Pouches, Scabbards, Straps, Etc.

job.name: Jeweler
job.description: Designs, Makes, And Repairs Necklaces, Bracelets, Watches, Etc., Often Containing Jewels.

job.name: Locksmith
job.description: Makes And Repairs Locks.

job.name: Luthier
job.description: Makes And Repairs Stringed Instruments.

job.name: Mercer
job.description: Weaves Textile Fabrics, Especially Silks, Velvets, And Other Fine Materials.

job.name: Optician
job.description: Makes And Repairs Eyeglasses.

job.name: Potter
job.description: Makes Pots, Bowls, Plates, Etc., Out Of Clay.

job.name: Printer
job.description: A Person Who Applies Pressure To An Inked Surface Resting Upon A Print Medium (Such As Paper Or Cloth), Thereby Transferring The Ink To Manufacture A Text.

job.name: Restorer
job.description: Repairs Or Renovates A Work Of Art So As To Return It To Its Original Condition.

job.name: Ropemaker
job.description: Braids Rope.

job.name: Rugmaker
job.description: Makes And Repairs Rugs By Braiding, Hooking, Weaving, Etc.

job.name: Saddler
job.description: Makes And Repairs Saddlery.

job.name: Seamstress/Tailor
job.description: Makes, Alters, Repairs, As Well As Occasionally Designing Garments.

job.name: Soaper
job.description: Makes Soap From Accumulated Mutton Fat, Wood Ash, And Natural Soda.

job.name: Tanner
job.description: Treats The Skins And Hides Of Animals To Produce Leather.

job.name: Taxidermist
job.description: Prepares, Stuffs, And Mounts The Skins Of Animals.

job.name: Tinker
job.description: Travels From Place To Place Mending Utensils.

job.name: Toymaker
job.description: Makes And Repairs Toys.

job.name: Watchmaker
job.description: Makes And Repairs Watches And Clocks.

job.name: Weaponsmith
job.description: Specializes In Making And Repairing Weapons.

job.name: Weaver
job.description: Makes Fabric By Weaving Fiber Together.

job.name: Wheelwright
job.description: Makes And Repairs Wooden Wheels.

job.name: Whittler/Woodcarver
job.description: Fashions Wood Into Various Shapes.

job.name: Assassin
job.description: Murders Through Stealth For Reasons Pertaining To Money, Politics, Or Religion.

job.name: Bandit
job.description: A Robber Or Outlaw Belonging To A Gang And Typically Operating In An Isolated Or Lawless Area.

job.name: Burglar
job.description: Illegally Enters Buildings And Steals Things.

job.name: Charlatan/Conman
job.description: Tricks People By Gaining Their Trust And Persuading Them To Believe Something That Is Not True In Order To Benefit From The Encounter.

job.name: Cockfighter/Gamefighter
job.description: Engages In Arena Matches In Which Animals Or Monsters Are Pitted Against One Another, Typically To The Death.

job.name: Crime Boss
job.description: Controls And Supervises A Criminal Organization.

job.name: Cutpurse
job.description: A Pickpocket Or Thief.

job.name: Drug Dealer
job.description: Dealer Of Illegal Substances.

job.name: Drug Lord
job.description: Controls A Network Of Persons Involved In The Illegal Drugs Trade And Transactions.

job.name: Extortioner
job.description: Extorts Money From Someone By Threatening To Expose Embarrassing Information About Them.

job.name: Fence
job.description: Deals In Stolen Goods.

job.name: Forger
job.description: Produces Fraudulent Copies Or Imitations.

job.name: Fugitive
job.description: A Person Who Has Escaped From A Place Or Is In Hiding, Especially To Avoid Arrest Or Persecution.

job.name: Highwayman
job.description: Robs Travelers On A Road.

job.name: Kidnapper
job.description: Abducts People And Holds Them Captive, Typically To Obtain A Ransom.

job.name: Loan Shark
job.description: Charges Extremely High Rates Of Interest For Moneylending, Typically Under Illegal Conditions.

job.name: Pirate
job.description: Attacks And Robs Ships At Sea.

job.name: Poacher
job.description: Hunts Illegal Game.

job.name: Poisoner
job.description: Makes Poisons To Harm Or Kill.

job.name: Raider/Marauder
job.description: Makes Sudden, Unprompted Attacks Against Defenseless Or Near-Defenseless Settlements.

job.name: Smuggler
job.description: Manages The Import Or Export Of Goods Secretly, In Violation Of The Law, Especially Without Payment Of Legal Duty.

job.name: Thief
job.description: Steals People’S Property, Especially By Stealth And Without Using Force Or Violence.

job.name: Affeeror
job.description: Determines The Values Of Fines And Amercements.

job.name: Agister
job.description: Affords Pasture To The Livestock Of Others For A Price.

job.name: Alderman
job.description: A Civic Dignitary In The Local Council Ranked Below The Mayor.

job.name: Alienist
job.description: Assesses The Competence Of A Defendant In A Court Of Law.

job.name: Assay Master
job.description: Oversees The Testing Of Currency.

job.name: Baron/Baroness
job.description: A Member Of The Lowest Order Of The British Nobility.

job.name: Chancellor
job.description: A Senior State Or Legal Official.

job.name: Chief
job.description: Leads Or Rules A People Or Clan.

job.name: Conservationist
job.description: Advocates For The Protection And Preservation Of The Environment And Wildlife.

job.name: Count/Earl/Countess
job.description: A Nobleperson Ranking Above A Viscount And Below A Marquess.

job.name: Courtier
job.description: Attends Court As A Companion Or Adviser To The King Or Queen.

job.name: Diplomat
job.description: An Official Representing A Country Abroad.

job.name: Duke/Duchess
job.description: Rules Over A Duchy And Is Of The Highest Rank Below The Monarch.

job.name: Emperor/Empress
job.description: The Supreme Sovereign Ruler Of An Extensive Group Of States Or Countries Under A Single Authority.

job.name: Judge
job.description: Decides Cases In A Court Of Law.

job.name: King/Queen
job.description: The Ruler Of An Independent State And Its People.

job.name: Knight
job.description: Serves His Or Her Sovereign After Being Bestowed A Rank Of Royal Honor.

job.name: Lady-in-Waiting
job.description: Attends A Queen, Princess, Or Other High-Ranking Feminine Nobleperson.

job.name: Lawyer/Advocate
job.description: Practices Or Studies Law, Typically An Attorney Or A Counselor.

job.name: Marquess/Marchioness
job.description: A Nobleperson Ranking Above A Count And Below A Duke.

job.name: Master-of-Coin
job.description: Supervises The Royal Treasury, Advises The Monarch On Financial Matters, And Is Responsible For Raising Money Through Taxation.

job.name: Master-of-the-Revels
job.description: Responsible For Overseeing Royal Festivities.

job.name: Minister
job.description: Assists With The Administration Of Business.

job.name: Noble/Aristocrat
job.description: A Person Belonging To A Class With High Social Or Political Status.

job.name: Notary
job.description: Performs Certain Legal Formalities, Especially To Draw Up Or Certify Contracts, Deeds, And Other Documents For Use In Other Jurisdictions.

job.name: Orator/Spokesman
job.description: Makes Statements On Behalf Of A Group Or Individual Nobleperson.

job.name: Page
job.description: A Young Attendant To A Person Of Noble Rank.

job.name: Prince/Princess
job.description: The Direct Descendant Of A Monarch.

job.name: Senator
job.description: Partakes In Governmental Decision-Making After Being Elected.

job.name: Sheriff
job.description: The Chief Executive Officer In A County, Having Various Administrative And Judicial Functions.

job.name: Spymaster
job.description: Directs A Network Of Subordinate Espionage Agents For A State, Kingdom, Or Empire.

job.name: Steward
job.description: Supervises Both The Estate And Household Of His Lord Or Lady While They Are Away.

job.name: Squire
job.description: Acts As An Attendant To A Knight Before Attempting To Become A Knight Themselves.

job.name: Tax Collector
job.description: Collects Unpaid Taxes From People, Guilds, Or Businesses.

job.name: Viscount/Viscountess
job.description: A Nobleperson Ranking Above A Baron And Below A Count.

job.name: Ward
job.description: A Member Of A Noble House Who Has Been Taken In By Another Noble Family To Be Raised For A Time.

job.name: Acater
job.description: Provides And Prepares Foodstuffs Or Delicacies For Events Such As Festivals.

job.name: Tunner
job.description: Fills Casks In A Brewery Or Winery.

job.name: Baker
job.description: Bakes Bread And Cakes.

job.name: Barber
job.description: Cuts Hair And Shaves Or Trims Beards.

job.name: Barkeep
job.description: Works And Serves Drinks In A Bar.

job.name: Barmaid/Barboy
job.description: Serves Drinks And Food In A Bar As Well As Engaging With Customers.

job.name: Butcher
job.description: Cuts Up And Sells Meat.

job.name: Butler
job.description: The Chief Servant Of A Household.

job.name: Caregiver
job.description: Looks After A Sick, Elderly, Or Disabled Person.

job.name: Charcoal Maker
job.description: Manufactures Charcoal By Carbonizing Wood In A Kiln.

job.name: Chatelaine/Majordomo
job.description: A Person In Charge Of A Large Household.

job.name: Chimney Sweeper
job.description: A Small Person, Typically A Child, Who Ascends Chimneys To Clean Them.

job.name: Clerk
job.description: Undertakes Routine Administrative Duties In A Business Or Bank.

job.name: Cook
job.description: Prepares Food For Eating.

job.name: Copyist
job.description: Makes Copies Of Handwritten Documents Or Music.

job.name: Croupier
job.description: Runs A Gaming Table By Gathering In And Paying Out Money Or Tokens.

job.name: Exterminator
job.description: Exterminates Unwanted Rodents And Insects.

job.name: Food & Drink Taster
job.description: Ingests Food That Was Prepared For Someone Else To Confirm It Is Safe To Eat.

job.name: Gardener/Landscaper
job.description: Tends And Cultivates A Garden.

job.name: Gongfarmer
job.description: Digs Out And Removes Excrement From Privies And Cesspits.

job.name: Gravedigger
job.description: Digs Graves For The Purposes Of A Funeral Ceremony.

job.name: Groundskeeper
job.description: Maintains An Athletic Field, A Park, Or The Grounds Of A Graveyard Or Other Institution.

job.name: Kitchen Drudge
job.description: Performs Menial Work In A Kitchen.

job.name: Knacker
job.description: Disposes Of Dead Or Unwanted Animals.

job.name: Lamplighter
job.description: Lights Street Or Road Lights At Dusk.

job.name: Laundry Worker
job.description: A Laborer Who Takes Part In The Washing, Drying, And Ironing Of Clothes And Other Fabric Items.

job.name: Lector
job.description: Reads To Others While They Work For Entertainment.

job.name: Longshoreman
job.description: Loads And Unloads Ships In A Port.

job.name: Maid
job.description: A Domestic Servant Of A Household.

job.name: Nanny/Nursemaid
job.description: A Servant Employed To Look After A Young Child Or Children.

job.name: Operator
job.description: A Laborer Who Operates Equipment, Typically In Construction.

job.name: Pastry Chef
job.description: Makes Desserts, Especially Cakes And Pastries.

job.name: Plumber
job.description: Installs And Repairs The Fittings Of Water Supply And Sanitation.

job.name: Porter
job.description: Carries Luggage And Other Loads.

job.name: Prostitute
job.description: Engages In Sexual Activity For Payment.

job.name: Quarryman/Quarrywoman
job.description: Quarries Stone.

job.name: Servant
job.description: Performs Duties For Others, Especially A Person Employed In A House Or As A Personal Attendant.

job.name: Stagehand
job.description: Moves Scenery Or Props Before Or During The Performance Of A Theatrical Production.

job.name: Street Cleaner
job.description: Cleans Streets And Alleyways After Dark.

job.name: Talent Scout
job.description: Searches For Talented Individuals Who Can Be Employed Or Promoted.

job.name: Trainer
job.description: Trains Someone In A Particular Skill, Usually Physical, For Money.

job.name: Water Bearer
job.description: Brings Water From Rivers, Wells, And Lakes Back To Their Settlement.

job.name: Wet Nurse
job.description: A Woman Employed To Suckle Another Woman’S Child.

job.name: Abjurer
job.description: A Mage Focused In Protective Spells.

job.name: Alchemist
job.description: Transforms Or Creates Something Within Nature Through (Usually) Ritualist Magic.

job.name: Archmage
job.description: An Extremely Powerful Mage.

job.name: Conjuror
job.description: Conjures Spirits Or Familiars.

job.name: Elementalist
job.description: Manipulates Nature’S Elements To Their Will.

job.name: Enchanter/Enchantress
job.description: Uses Sorcery To Put Someone Or Something Under A Spell.

job.name: Evoker
job.description: Manipulates Energy Or Taps Into An Unseen Source Of Power In Order To Produce A Desired Kinetic End.

job.name: Healer
job.description: Able To Cure A Disease Or Injury Using Magic.

job.name: Hearth Witch/Hearth Wizard
job.description: Incorporates Spells And Enchantments In Cooking.

job.name: Illusionist
job.description: Performs Tricks And Spells That Deceive The Senses.

job.name: Mage
job.description: A Magic-User.

job.name: Medium
job.description: Uses Extrasensory Perception, Magic, Or Divine Powers To Identify Information Hidden From The Normal Senses.

job.name: Meteorologist
job.description: Forecasts And Manipulates Weather.

job.name: Necromancer
job.description: Communicates With And Conjures The Spirits Of The Dead.

job.name: Ritualist
job.description: Practices Or Advocates The Observance Of Ritual (Formula Intended To Trigger A Magical Effect On A Person Or Objects).

job.name: Runecaster
job.description: Uses Special Alphabets To Create Runes (Symbols Possessing Magical Effects Capable Of Being Used Multiple Times).

job.name: Sage
job.description: A Wise And Experienced Magic-User.

job.name: Seer/Oracle
job.description: Able To See What The Future Holds Through Supernatural Insight.

job.name: Shaman
job.description: Accesses And Influences The World Of Good And Evil Spirits.

job.name: Shapeshifter
job.description: A Person With The Ability To Change Their Physical Form.

job.name: Summoner
job.description: A Mage Able To Summon Forth Magical Beasts, Creatures, And Monsters.

job.name: Transmuter
job.description: Alters Matter In Form, Appearance, Or Nature.

job.name: Witchdoctor
job.description: A Tribal Mage With Powers Of Healing, Divination, And Protection Against The Magic Of Others.

job.name: Witch
job.description: A Woman Who Has Supernatural Powers And Practices Sorcery, Typically In Solitude.

job.name: Wordsmith
job.description: Draws Their Power From Language And Casts By Dictation.

job.name: Admiral
job.description: Commands A Fleet Or Naval Squadron.

job.name: Bailiff
job.description: Looks After Prisoners.

job.name: Bodyguard
job.description: Escorts And Protects Another Person, Especially A Dignitary.

job.name: Bouncer
job.description: Prevents Troublemakers From Entering Or To Eject Them From The Premises Of An Establishment.

job.name: Captain
job.description: An Army Officer Of High Rank In Charge Of Commanding Squadrons Of Soldiers.

job.name: Castellan
job.description: The Governor Of A Castle.

job.name: Cavalryman/Cavalier
job.description: A Skilled Horseback Rider.

job.name: City Watch
job.description: An Officer Of Law Enforcement Who Resides In Larger Towns Or Cities.

job.name: Commissar
job.description: Teaches Principles And Policies To Military Units.

job.name: Constable
job.description: An Officer With Limited Policing Authority, Typically In A Small Town.

job.name: Detective/Investigator
job.description: Investigates And Solves Crimes.

job.name: Drummer/Fifer
job.description: A Non-Combatant Foot Soldier Who Sounds Signals For Changes In Formation In Combat.

job.name: Duelist
job.description: Skilled In One-On-One Combat.

job.name: Executioner
job.description: Carries Out A Sentence Of Death On A Legally Condemned Person.

job.name: Firefighter
job.description: Extinguishes Fires.

job.name: Guard/Sentinel
job.description: A Person Who Keeps Watch, Especially A Soldier Or Other Person Formally Assigned To Protect A Person Or To Control Access To A Place.

job.name: General
job.description: The Chief Commander Of An Army.

job.name: Inspection Officer
job.description: Responsible For The Inspection Of Military Units To Ensure They Meet Appropriate Standards Of Training And Efficiency.

job.name: Intelligence Officer
job.description: Collects, Compiles And Organizes Information About The Enemy.

job.name: Jailer
job.description: Supervises A Jail And The Prisoners In It.

job.name: Lieutenant
job.description: An Officer Of Middle Rank In The Armed Forces.

job.name: Marksman/Archer
job.description: In Long-Range Weapons, Such As The Bow, Crossbow, Sling, Etc. To Inflict Damage From Afar.

job.name: Marshall
job.description: Has The Charge Of The Cavalry In The Household Of A Monarch.

job.name: Medic
job.description: A Medical Practitioner Equipped For The Battlefield.

job.name: Mercenary
job.description: A Soldier Without Allegiance Who Works For Money, Typically A Member Of A Company Or Guild.

job.name: Privateer
job.description: Engages In Maritime Warfare Under A Commission Of War.

job.name: Quartermaster
job.description: Responsible For Providing Quarters, Rations, Clothing, And Other Supplies.

job.name: Royal Guard
job.description: Responsible For The Protection Of A Royal Person.

job.name: Runner
job.description: Carries Information Between Lines In Wartime.

job.name: Sapper
job.description: A Soldier Responsible For Tasks Such As Building And Repairing Roads And Bridges, Laying And Clearing Mines, Etc.

job.name: Sergeant
job.description: An Officer Instructed With A Protective Duty, Typically Worth “Half A Knight” In Regard.

job.name: Sergeant-at-Arms
job.description: Charged With Keeping Order During Meetings And, If Necessary, Participates In Battle.

job.name: Scout
job.description: Sent Ahead Of A Main Force So As To Gather Information About The Enemy’S Position, Strength, Or Movements.

job.name: Siege Artillerist
job.description: Works The Artillery Machines Of An Army.

job.name: Slave Driver
job.description: Oversees And Urges On Slaves At Work.

job.name: Soldier/Man-at-Arms
job.description: Serves In An Army.

job.name: Special Force Soldier
job.description: Carries Out Special Operations.

job.name: Spy
job.description: Secretly Collects And Reports Information On The Activities, Movements, And Plans Of An Enemy Or Competitor.

job.name: Tactician
job.description: Uses A Carefully Planned Military Strategy To Achieve A Specific End.

job.name: Tollkeeper
job.description: Collects Tolls At A Bridge, Road Etc. Where A Charge Is Made.

job.name: Torturer
job.description: Inflicts Severe Pain On Someone As A Punishment Or In Order To Force Them To Do Or Say Something.

job.name: Warden
job.description: Responsible For The Supervision Of A Particular Place Or Thing Or For Ensuring That Regulations Associated With It Are Obeyed.

job.name: Warmage
job.description: A Soldier Skilled In Destructive Battle Magic.

job.name: Abbot/Abbess
job.description: The Head Of An Abbey Of Monks.

job.name: Acolyte
job.description: Assists The Celebrant In A Religious Service Or Procession.

job.name: Almoner
job.description: Distributes Money And Food To Poor People.

job.name: Archbishop
job.description: Responsible For An Archdiocese, Their Surrounding District.

job.name: Bishop
job.description: A Senior Member Of The Clergy, Usually In Charge Of A Diocese And Empowered To Confer Holy Orders.

job.name: Cantor
job.description: Sings Liturgical Music And Leads Prayer In A Synagogue.

job.name: Cardinal
job.description: A Leading Dignitary Of A Church, Nominated By The Highest Official.

job.name: Chaplain
job.description: A Member Of The Clergy Attached To A Private Chapel, Institution, Ship, Branch Of The Armed Forces, Etc.

job.name: Confessor
job.description: Hears Confessions And Gives Absolution And Spiritual Counsel.

job.name: Cultist
job.description: A Member Of A Cult Who Generally Lives Outside Of Conventional Society And Worships An Unorthodox Patron.

job.name: Cult Leader
job.description: The Organizational Leader Of A Cult Who Is Occasionally Also The Founder.

job.name: Deacon
job.description: An Ordained Minister Of An Order Ranking Below That Of Priest.

job.name: Diviner
job.description: Seeks Ultimate Divination In Order To Further Understand Or Meet Godly Substance.

job.name: Exorcist
job.description: Expels Or Attempts To Expel Evil Spirits From A Person Or Place.

job.name: High Priest/Pope
job.description: The Chief Priest Of A Religion.

job.name: Inquisitor
job.description: Seeks To Eliminate Heresy And Other Things Contrary To The Doctrine Or Teachings Of Their Faith.

job.name: Missionary
job.description: Goes On A Religious Mission To Promote Their Faith In A Foreign Place.

job.name: Nun
job.description: A Member Of A Religious Community Of Women, Especially A Cloistered One, Living Under Vows Of Poverty, Chastity, And Obedience.

job.name: Pardoner
job.description: Raises Money For Religious Works By Soliciting Offerings And Granting Indulgences.

job.name: Priest
job.description: Has The Authority To Perform Certain Rites And Administer Certain Sacraments.

job.name: Prophet
job.description: Regarded As An Inspired Teacher Or Proclaimer Of The Will Of God.

job.name: Sexton
job.description: Looks After A Church And Churchyard, Sometimes Acting As Bell-Ringer And Formerly As A Gravedigger.

job.name: Templar
job.description: Fights In A Religious Military Order.

job.name: Abecedarian
job.description: Teaches The Illiterate.

job.name: Accoucheur/Obstetrician/Midwife
job.description: Assists In Childbirth And The Care Of Women Giving Birth.

job.name: Anthropologist
job.description: Studies The Customs, Beliefs, And Relationships Of Humanoids And Intellectually And Culturally Advanced Creatures.

job.name: Apothecary
job.description: Prepares And Sells Medicines, Drugs, And Potions.

job.name: Apprentice
job.description: Studies A Trade Under A Skilled Employer.

job.name: Archaeologist
job.description: Studies Humanoid History And Prehistory Through The Excavation Of Sites And The Analysis Of Artifacts And Other Physical Remains.

job.name: Archivist
job.description: Maintains And Is In Charge Of Archives.

job.name: Assayer
job.description: Determiner Of The Proportions Of Metal In Ore And The Amount Of Copper, Silver, Gold, Or Platinum In Coins.

job.name: Astrologer
job.description: Uses Astrology To Tell Others About Their Character Or To Predict Their Future.

job.name: Astronomer
job.description: Makes Observations Of Celestial And Scientific Phenomena Within The Material Plane.

job.name: Bloodletter
job.description: Surgically Removes Some Of A Patient’S Blood For Therapeutic Purposes.

job.name: Botanist
job.description: An Expert In Or Student Of The Scientific Study Of Plants.

job.name: Cartographer
job.description: A Scholar And Illustrator Of Maps.

job.name: Chemist
job.description: Engaged In Chemical Research Or Experiments.

job.name: Dean
job.description: The Head Of A College Or University.

job.name: Doctor/Physician
job.description: A Qualified Practitioner Of Medicine.

job.name: Drakologist
job.description: Studies Or Is An Expert In The Branch Of Zoology Concerned With Dragons.

job.name: Engineer
job.description: Designer Of A Machine Or Structure.

job.name: Entomologist
job.description: Studies Or Is An Expert In The Branch Of Zoology Concerned With Insects.

job.name: Herbalist
job.description: Practices Healing By The Use Of Herbs.

job.name: Historian
job.description: An Expert In Or Student Of History, Especially That Of A Particular Period, Geographical Region, Or Social Phenomenon.

job.name: Horologist
job.description: A Scholar Of Time And Entropy.

job.name: Librarian
job.description: Administers Or Assists In A Library.

job.name: Mathematician
job.description: A Scholar Of The Abstract Science Of Number, Quantity, And Space.

job.name: Mortician
job.description: Prepares Dead Bodies For Burial Or Cremation And Makes Arrangements For Funerals.

job.name: Nurse
job.description: Cares For The Sick Or Infirm, Especially In A Hospital.

job.name: Optometrist
job.description: Examines The Eyes For Visual Defects And Prescribes Eyeglasses.

job.name: Philosopher
job.description: A Scholar Of The Fundamental Nature Of Knowledge, Reality, And Existence.

job.name: Professor
job.description: A Teacher Of The Highest Rank In A College Or University.

job.name: Scholar/Researcher
job.description: A Specialist In A Particular Branch Of Study Who Pursues The Acquisition Of Knowledge.

job.name: Scribe
job.description: Copies Out Manuscripts.

job.name: Student
job.description: Attends School Or Learns Under Other To Enter And Pursue A Particular Subject.

job.name: Surgeon/Chirurgeon
job.description: Practices Surgery.

job.name: Taxonomist
job.description: Groups Organisms Into Categories.

job.name: Teacher
job.description: Instructs On A Particular Skill Or Subject.

job.name: Theologian
job.description: Engages In The Study Of The Nature Of God And Religious Belief.

job.name: Tutor
job.description: Charged With The Instruction And Guidance Of Another.

job.name: Veterinarian
job.description: Treats Diseased Or Injured Animals.

job.name: Zoologist
job.description: An Expert In Or A Student Of The Behavior, Physiology, Classification, And Distribution Of Animals.

job.name: Boatman
job.description: Mans A Small Seacraft.

job.name: Bosun
job.description: In Charge Of Organizing The Equipment And Crew Of A Ship.

job.name: Cabbie/Wagoner
job.description: Drives A Horse-Drawn Wagon.

job.name: Cabin Boy/Cabin Girl
job.description: Waits On The Orders Of A Ship’S Officers And Passengers.

job.name: Caravaneer
job.description: Travels Or Lives In A Caravan.

job.name: Charioteer
job.description: Drives A Chariot.

job.name: Carter
job.description: Transports Goods By Cart.

job.name: Ferryman
job.description: Operates A Ferry.

job.name: First Mate
job.description: The Deck Officer Second In Command To The Master Of A Ship.

job.name: Helmsman
job.description: Steers A Ship Or Boat.

job.name: Navigator
job.description: Directs The Route Or Course Of A Ship Or Other Form Of Transportation, Especially By Using Instruments And Maps.

job.name: Purser
job.description: Keeps The Accounts Of A Ship, Especially As The Head Steward On A Passenger Vessel.

job.name: Sailor
job.description: Works As A Member Of The Crew Of A Commercial Or Naval Ship Or Boat.

job.name: Sea Captain
job.description: Commands A Ship.

job.name: Shipwright
job.description: A Carpenter Skilled In Ship Construction And Repair.

job.name: Adventurer
job.description: Wanders The World In Search Of Knowledge, Treasure, Fame, Glory Or A Multitude Of Additional Wants And Desires.

job.name: Beggar/Pauper
job.description: Lives By Asking For Money Or Food.

job.name: Blood Hunter/Monster Hunter
job.description: Takes On Jobs To Hunt Down And Kill Or Capture Dangerous Creatures.

job.name: Bounty Hunter
job.description: Pursues A Criminal Or Fugitive For Whom A Reward Is Offered.

job.name: Crossing Sweeper
job.description: Sweeps A Path Ahead Of People Crossing Dirty Urban Streets In Exchange For A Gratuity.

job.name: Deserter
job.description: A Member Of The Armed Forces Who Has Deserted.

job.name: Disgraced Noble
job.description: A Person Of High Birth Who Has Since Loss Their Respect, Honor, Or Esteem In Some Or All Noble Circles.

job.name: Drunkard
job.description: A Person Who Is Habitually Drunk And Considers Themselves A Professional In The Task.

job.name: Dungeon Delver
job.description: Navigates Underground Labyrinths In Search Of Any Treasure They May Find.

job.name: Elder
job.description: A Person Of A Greater Age, Especially One With A Respected Position In Society.

job.name: Exile
job.description: Lives Away From Their Native Country, Either From Choice Or Compulsion.

job.name: Explorer
job.description: Explores Unfamiliar Areas In Search Of Geographical Or Scientific Information.

job.name: Ex-Criminal
job.description: A Person Who Has Been Convicted Of A Crime And Has Since Served Their Sentence, Or Who Has Preemptively Given Up Their Life Of Crime.

job.name: Folk Hero
job.description: A Celebrity Who Is Greatly Admired By Many People Of A Particular Kind Or In A Particular Place.

job.name: Gambler
job.description: Bets Money On Sports, Card Games, Or Games Of Chance In The Hope Of A Profit.

job.name: Grave Robber/Tomb Raider
job.description: Steals Valuables From Graves And Tombs.

job.name: Heretic
job.description: Differs In Opinion From Established Religious Dogma.

job.name: Hermit
job.description: Lives In Solitude, Typically As A Religious Or Spiritual Discipline.

job.name: Housewife/Househusband
job.description: Cares For His Or Her Family By Managing Household Affairs And Completing Housework.

job.name: Pilgrim
job.description: Journeys To Some Sacred Place As An Act Of Religious Devotion, Occasionally To Settle There.

job.name: Prisoner
job.description: Held In Confinement As A Punishment For Crimes They Have Been Convicted Of.

job.name: Rag-and-Bone Man
job.description: Collects Unwanted Household Items And Sells Them To Merchants.

job.name: Rebel/Political Dissident
job.description: Rises In Opposition Or Armed Resistance Against An Established Government Or Ruler.

job.name: Refugee
job.description: Leaves Their Home In Order To Escape War, Persecution, Or Natural Disaster.

job.name: Runaway Slave
job.description: A Slave Who Has Left Their Master And Traveled Without Authorization.

job.name: Scavenger/Mudlark/Tosher
job.description: Searches For And Collects Discarded Items.

job.name: Slave
job.description: A Person Who Is The Legal Property Of Another And Forced To Obey Them.

job.name: Squatter
job.description: Unlawfully Occupies An Uninhabited Building Or Unused Land.

job.name: Traveler/Wanderer/Vagabond
job.description: Wanders From Place To Place Without A Permanent Home Or Job.

job.name: Urchin
job.description: A Child Who Lives Or Spends Most Of Their Time In The Streets, Occasionally Working As A Thief Or Pickpocket.
